name: Mobile Arcade Virtual Racer
description: Bring the excitement of your favorite high-speed, car racing arcade game straight to your mobile device. By utilizing cutting edge augmented reality technology, Mobile Arcade turns your device into a fast-paced, virtual race track that you can take anywhere! Take control of the vehicle of your choice and sprint, jump and maneuver your way around the track. Demolish obstacles with a simple twist of the wrist, all while avoiding the perilous traps that get in your way.
